casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Maurice Edward THOMPSON 408P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 3, 2019 Maurice Edward Thompson, for Thompson, Maurice Edward. Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Matthew Delbridge, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th of November 2018 by Defendant to Dismiss:

"Motion Dismissed Ex Mero Motu by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of March 2019."
